info.author: Vivek Vaidya
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Gyrfalcon is a note/thought/task management system. It allows you to take your
notes and other bits of information and:

    * Put them in hierarchical trees
    * Tag them
    * Search within your workspace of notes by tag or text
    * Setup link between them, and more.
info.keywords: Note, trees, gtd, tagging, information management
info.name: Gyrfalcon
info.html_description:
Gyrfalcon is a note/thought/task management system. It allows you to take your notes and other bits of information and:

  • Put them in hierarchical trees
  • Tag them
  • Search within your workspace of notes by tag or text
  • Setup link between them, and more.
